name: Laravel with MySQL, Redis & phpMyAdmin
postCreateCommand: composer install && cp .env.example .env && echo 'DB_HOST=mysql' >> .env && echo 'DB_PORT=3306' >> .env && echo 'DB_DATABASE=laravel' >> .env && echo 'DB_USERNAME=root' >> .env && echo 'DB_PASSWORD=password' >> .env && echo 'REDIS_HOST=redis' >> .env && echo 'REDIS_PASSWORD=password' >> .env && php artisan key:generate
